Accept Humbber Luxury Hotel About Casino Rooms Event Welcome to Luxury Hotel Humbber | Privacy Policy View Details Privacy Policy for Humbber Hotel At Humbber Hotel Geolocation India, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers and website visitors. We have therefore developed a Privacy Policy that covers how we collect, use, disclose, transfer, and store your personal information. Introduction Humbber Hotel Geolocation India is a hotel located in India that provides accommodation and related services to customers. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. Personal Information Collection We collect personal information from you when you use our website, make a reservation, or communicate with us. This information may include your name, address, email address, phone number, credit card information, and other details that you provide to us. Use of Personal Information We use your personal information to provide you with the services you have requested, to communicate with you, and to improve our website and services. We may also use your personal information to send you newsletters, promotions, and other marketing materials. Disclosure of Personal Information We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to others. We may share your personal information with our affiliates, partners, and service providers who assist us in providing you with our services. We may also disclose your personal information as required by law or in response to legal process. Data Security We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We use secure socket layer (SSL) technology to encrypt your personal information when you transmit it to us through our website. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience and to personalize our website and services. You can manage your cookie preferences by adjusting your browser settings. Third-Party Websites Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such websites. Your Rights You have the right to access, modify, and delete your personal information. You can contact us to exercise these rights. Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on our website. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at Humbber@gmail.com Data Protection Impact Assessment We conduct a data protection impact assessment (DPIA) for high-risk processing activities. Our DPIAs help us identify and mitigate risks to the privacy and security of personal data. Breach Notification We have procedures in place for reporting and investigating data breaches. If we experience a data breach that is likely to result in a high risk to the rights and freedoms of data subjects, we will notify them without undue delay. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing Humbber Hotel in India Thanks for Choosing Humbber! At Humbber, we're more than just a hotel; we're a sanctuary of comfort, personalized service, and authentic Indian experiences. Nestled amidst the vibrant tapestry of India, our haven offers a respite from the bustling world outside, while providing a gateway to the soul of this incredible country. We understand that your choice of accommodation is a significant part of your journey. It's the place where you unwind, recharge, and create lasting memories. Therefore, we've poured our heart and soul into crafting a space where every detail speaks to your comfort and well-being. From the moment you step into our lobby, greeted by the warm smiles of our dedicated staff, to the moment you drift off to sleep in your luxuriously appointed room, we ensure every interaction is a testament to our commitment to exceeding expectations. Our commitment extends beyond the walls of our hotel. We believe in sharing the magic of India with our guests, offering curated experiences that allow you to delve deeper into the rich culture and heritage of this captivating land. Whether you're seeking a tranquil escape amidst sprawling gardens, a culinary adventure savoring the diverse flavors of India, or an exploration of ancient temples and vibrant markets, we'll guide you through enriching experiences tailored to your interests. We recognize that each guest is unique, with individual preferences and aspirations. Our team takes pride in understanding your needs and tailoring our services to ensure a truly personalized experience. From organizing bespoke excursions and arranging private dining experiences to catering to dietary requirements and providing insightful recommendations for local attractions, we strive to create a seamless and unforgettable stay. Here at Humbber, we believe in the power of connection. We're not just a place to stay, but a community where you can forge connections with fellow travelers, exchange stories, and create memories that will last a lifetime. Our shared spaces are designed for interaction, inspiring conversations and fostering a sense of belonging. India is a land of vibrant contrasts, where ancient traditions seamlessly blend with modern dynamism. Our hotel reflects this spirit, embodying the warmth and hospitality of Indian culture while providing the modern amenities and comforts you expect from a world-class destination. We understand that your time is precious, and we aim to make your stay at Humbber effortless and enjoyable. Our staff is dedicated to anticipating your needs, providing prompt and efficient service, and creating an environment where you can truly relax and unwind. Our commitment to sustainability is woven into the fabric of our hotel. We strive to minimize our environmental footprint by embracing eco-friendly practices and championing responsible tourism. From sourcing locally sourced ingredients for our dining experiences to implementing energy-saving measures, we are committed to preserving the beauty and integrity of the land we call home. We invite you to experience the true meaning of hospitality at Humbber. We're not just providing a place to rest your head, but offering a haven where you can reconnect with yourself, discover the wonders of India, and create memories that will linger long after your departure. Every moment at Humbber is crafted with intention, from the carefully selected artwork adorning our walls to the soothing aromas wafting from our kitchen. We believe in creating an atmosphere that nourishes your soul, ignites your senses, and leaves you feeling truly inspired. Home
